mapper.select: SELECT ss.id, ss.disease_id AS diseaseId, ss.syndrome_id AS syndromeId, ss.sytech_id as sytechId, ss.detail, ss.operation, ss.recommend, ds.name AS syndromeName, dd.content AS diseaseName, ts.name FROM sch_sytech ss INNER JOIN ts_sytech ts ON ss.sytech_id = ts.id AND ts.STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN dict_syndrome ds ON ss.syndrome_id = ds.id AND ds.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN dict_disease dd ON ss.disease_id = dd.id AND dd.STATUS = 1 WHERE ss.sytech_id = #{sytechId} AND ss.disease_id = #{diseaseId} AND ss.syndrome_id = #{syndromeId} limit 1
